question: Odisha Skills 2018 was organished by __________.
option4: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
explanation: Odisha government has inaugurated 'Odisha Skills 2018', the state-level chapter of India Skill competition organised by National Skill Development Corporation. The competition would give a platform to the students of Odisha to show their talents. A skill-cum-common facility centre for filigree craftsman of the city was also inaugurated.
